keyword: how many calories are in the rolls at texas roadhouse
title: How Many Calories in Texas Roadhouse Rolls?
meta_description: Learn how many calories are in the rolls at Texas Roadhouse per serving, including carbs, fat, protein, and nutrition tips for your meal.
h1: How Many Calories in Texas Roadhouse Rolls?
assumptions: Fresh baked yeast dinner roll, plain without butter or toppings; approximately 60 g per roll.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by exact recipe, serving size, and preparation; Texas Roadhouse values may differ—check official sources or app for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One Texas Roadhouse roll contains about 204 calories and 5 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with restaurant or packaged info.

faqs.q: How many calories are in one Texas Roadhouse roll?
What are the carbs in Texas Roadhouse rolls?
faqs.a: About 33 g carbs per roll, including 1 g fiber and 4 g sugars.

faqs.q: Do Texas Roadhouse rolls have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 250 mg sodium per roll due to the yeast and dough ingredients.

faqs.q: How does adding butter affect calories in Texas Roadhouse rolls?
faqs.a: One teaspoon of their cinnamon honey butter adds about 100 calories.

faqs.q: Are Texas Roadhouse rolls high in protein?
faqs.a: Moderately, with 5 g protein per roll—better paired with lean meats for more.
